scripts.cloc-vscode: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/microsoft/vscode.git || true && cd vscode && npx cloc --exclude-dir=node_modules,fixtures --match-f='.*\.(js|ts)$' ./src --by-file
scripts.cloc-habitica: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/HabitRPG/habitica || true && cd habitica && npx cloc --exclude-dir=node_modules,fixtures --match-f='.*\.(js|ts|vue)$' website/client/src website/server --by-file
scripts.cloc-bower: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/BugsJS/bower.git || true && cd bower && npx cloc --match-f='.*\.(js|ts)$' --by-file lib
scripts.cloc-eslint: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/BugsJS/eslint.git || true && cd eslint && npx cloc --match-f='.*\.(e?js|ts)$' --by-file lib bin tools tests/lib templates
scripts.cloc-shields: cd projects && git clone https://github.com/BugsJS/shields.git || true && cd shields && npx cloc --match-f='.*\.(e?js|ts)$' --by-file lib services frontend
